ScanDirectoryList.Name: Directory Exclusions (Windows)
ScanDirectoryList.Items: ${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft Monitoring Agent\Agent\Health Service State\<:>${Windir}\Logs\<:>${Systemdrive}\WindowsAzure\Logs\<:>${Systemdrive}\Packages\Plugins\Microsoft.EnterpriseCloud.Monitoring.MicrosoftMonitoringAgent\<:>C:\Program Files\Trend Micro\Artifact\<:>C:\Program Files\Trend Micro\Cloud Endpoint\<:>C:\Program Files (x86)\Trend Micro\Endpoint Basecamp\<:>

Trend Micro Apex One server Exclusion List (Windows)

ScanDirectoryList.Name: Trend Micro Directory Windows SQL Exclusions
ScanDirectoryList.Items: #SQL<:>${Windir}\WINNT\Cluster\ #if using SQL Clustering<:>Q:\ #if using SQL Clustering<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\*\COM\<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL\Data\<:> #Analysis Services backup files<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL.X\OLAP\Backup\<:> #Full-Text catalog files<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL\FTDATA\ #Default instance:<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL*\FTDATA\ #Named instance:<:> #Files in Replication Snapshot folder<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL*.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\ReplData\<:> #The directory that holds Analysis Services data<:>${ProgramFiles}\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL.X\OLAP\Log\<:>
